text: Marvin Johnathan Rees (born April 1972) is a British politician. Since May 2016, he has served as mayor of Bristol. He is a member of the Labour Party. Rees grew up in Bristol. He is mixed race. His mother is British, and his father is Jamaican. He is married and has three children. ==References== Category:1972 births Category:Living people Category:Black British people Category:British mayors Category:Labour Party (UK) people Category:Politicians from Bristol
title: Marvin Rees
